protocol.name: P-G16222-1
protocol.text: Seeds were sterilized with diluted bleach (10-min incubation in 1.7% sodium hypochlorite, rinsed and washed seven times in sterile water) and incubated in 2.5 mL of liquid growing media (Murashige and Skoog half-strength solution in six-well plates) containing 30 mM sucrose. The plates were incubated in the dark at 4°C for two days (vernalization, to promote homogeneous germination) and then transferred to 23°C for four days in the dark before the treatments. This sample represents the control.

protocol.name: P-G16222-2
protocol.text: This sample represents the control. Dark grown Arabidopsis seedlings, 4d-old.

protocol.name: P-G16222-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted from the seedling samples using the Ambion RNAqueous kit (Ambion). RNA quality was assessed by agarose gel electrophoresis and spectrophotometry. RNA was processed for use on Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 GeneChip arrays.

protocol.name: P-G16222-5
protocol.text: Seeds were sterilized with diluted bleach (10-min incubation in 1.7% sodium hypochlorite, rinsed and washed seven times in sterile water) and incubated in 2.5 mL of liquid growing media (Murashige and Skoog half-strength solution in six-well plates) containing 30 mM sucrose. The plates were incubated in the dark at 4°C for two days (vernalization, to promote homogeneous germination) and then transferred to 23°C for four days in the dark before the treatments.

protocol.name: P-G16222-6
protocol.text: Dark grown Arabidopsis seedlings, 4d-old, were treated at 38°C for 90 minutes in the dark.

protocol.name: P-G16222-7
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings. Ecotype: Columbia 0; Age: 4 days; Germination: aerobic; Medium: Murashige-Skoog medium, half-strenght, sucrose 30 mM, 23°C, darkness; Treated under anoxia for 6h at 23°C in the dark. Anoxic treatments were carried out in the dark. An enclosed anaerobic work station (Anaerobic System model 1025; Forma Scientific, Marietta, OH) was used to provide an oxygen-free environment for seedling incubation. This chamber uses palladium catalyst wafers and desiccant wafers to maintain strict anaerobiosis to less than 10 µg mL–1 O2 (according to the manufacturer’s specifications). High-purity N2 was used to purge the chamber initially, and the working anaerobic gas mixture was N2:H2 with a ratio of 90:10.

protocol.name: P-G16222-8
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings. Ecotype: Columbia 0; Age: 4 days; Germination: aerobic; Medium: Murashige-Skoog medium, half-strenght, sucrose 30 mM, 23°C, darkness; Treated at 38°c for 90 minutes and thereafter under anoxia for 6h at 23°C in the dark.  An enclosed anaerobic work station (Anaerobic System model 1025; Forma Scientific, Marietta, OH) was used to provide an oxygen-free environment for seedling incubation. This chamber uses palladium catalyst wafers and desiccant wafers to maintain strict anaerobiosis to less than 10 µg mL–1 O2 (according to the manufacturer’s specifications). High-purity N2 was used to purge the chamber initially, and the working anaerobic gas mixture was N2:H2 with a ratio of 90:10.
